edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Convert

Class JingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Convert.JingUtil

  • public class JingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides call to Jing validation for AbbotConvert. Jing requires jing-20030619.jar and may work with more recent jars as the become available at http://www.thaiopensource.com/relaxng/jing.html. This jar comes with cocoon 2.1.11 but may be absent in other versions.
    Version:
    0.8, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main for standalone testing.

      • getErrorList

        public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> getErrorList()
        Returns Vector of integers indicating the number of errors in the validations performed by writeReportToFile since the JingUtil instance was created. This information is displayed next to the output files following a schema conversion.
        Returns:
        Vector of Integers corresponding to errors found during validation.

      • writeReportToFile

        public void writeReportToFile(java.lang.String the_schemafile,
                     java.lang.String the_xmlfile,
                     java.lang.String the_reportfile,
                     java.lang.String the_schemafn,
                     java.lang.String the_xmlfn)
        Generates an HTML file to present validation messages.
        Parameters:
        the_schemafile - The full path and name of the schema .rng file.
        the_xmlfile - The full path and name of the validated .xml output file.
        the_reportfile - The full path and name of the .html file to be written.
        the_schemafn - The name of the schema .rng file for display in the output.
        the_xmlfn - The name of the schema .rng file for display in the output.

      • getReport

        public java.lang.String getReport(java.lang.String the_schemafile,
                         java.lang.String the_xmlfile)
        Invokes Jing Validation of the output file against the schema file.
